name: Connections (itch) (E-Dawkins)
description:
Connections is a game about interacting with people to help them with tasks that make them feel good. In turn, connecting them helps you to tune into yourself demonstrating positive ways to enhance mental health. 

Credits: Programmers:
  • Ethan Dawkins
  • Jack Aylward
  • Samnang Yorng
Designers:
  • Monty Martin-Weber
  • Timothy Hurley
